name: wowcam-scraper

scripts.dclogsnode: sudo docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs node --follow
scripts.dclogsfs: sudo docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs flaresolverr --follow
scripts.dclogscaddy: sudo docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml logs caddy --follow
scripts.restart: npm run build && sleep 1 && npm run dcdown && sleep 1 && npm run dcup

author: MBODM (mbodm.com)
description: WOWCAM backend service to scrape addon data from the web
